137
October 13th 3
M. L. Rice
Lancaster, Ky
Sir;
Yours of the 12th instant to Governor Bramlette has been hand me for answer.
The Colonel commanding the regiment has the right to select an adjutant, who must be a Lieutenant of the line.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Gen of Ky
